
```{r}

f <- alist(
y ~ dnorm( mu , sigma ),
mu ~ dnorm( 0 , 10 ),
sigma ~ dexp( 1 )
)

fit <- quap(
f ,
data=list(y=c(-1,1)) ,
start=list(mu=0,sigma=1)
)

fit_stan <- ulam( f , data=list(y=c(-1,1)) )
```
